name: necon4abid
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), w1))
-| wb(w1, wn(wn(w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wn(wn(w1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), w1))
-| wb(w1, wn(wn(w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wn(wn(w1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), w1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wn(wn(w1)), wceq(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wn(wn(w1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c1), wn(w1)))

-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c1), wn(w1)))

comment: Contrapositive law deduction for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2008.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Nov-2019.)
